Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson homered to left (370 feet), Carpenter scored.
Riley Greene homered to right (356 feet), Meadows scored.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers earned a rare series win against the Red Sox.
The game was played at Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan, with an attendance of 30,173.
The Red Sox are 70-67, 39-29 Away, while the Tigers are 70-68, 35-34 Home.
Others: Beau Brieske pitched 1.1 innings with 2 walks and 1 strikeout.
Bryce Hurter pitched 5.0 innings with 6 hits, 1 earned run, 0 walks, and 5 strikeouts.
